messages.title: GET THE BEST DEAL FOR EDINBURGH SOUTH
messages.content: With Scottish MPs outvoted eleven-to-one at Westminster, we need strong SNP voices to protect Scotland's interests.

messages.title: WE WILL STAND UP FOR SCOTLAND

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strong SNP voices in Westminster to defend against budget cuts and to stand up for Scottish interests.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A hung Parliament with no overall majority will enable a large team of SNP MPs to challenge the system and ensure the best deal for Scotland and Edinburgh South.

issues.economy: The harsh cuts implemented by the Conservatives and supported by the Liberal Democrats could result in budget cuts and potential austerity measures affecting families across Scotland.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour will continue with Tory cuts and the SNP aims to address in-work poverty and prevent harsh austerity cuts.

politicalExperience.achievements: Familiar with a variety of different constituency issues and highly engaged in the local issues and concerns of people in Edinburgh South.

quotes.text: A strong team of SNP MPs can put heart back into Westminster economic policy. Holding the balance of power, we can use our strength to ensure that people, disabled and hard-working women, those currently carrying the highest burden no longer pay the price of austerity.

images.caption: Image of Neil Hay and Nicola Sturgeon
